5
Ontological Engineering
Inventory of Patterns (I)
• General Information: 
– Name
– Identifier 
– Ontology modelling component type (LP, AP and CP)
• Use Case, or problem to be addressed. 
• Ontology Design Pattern, or proposed solution in 
different formats. 
• Relations to other ontology model components. This slot 
is optional.
• Comments. This slot is also optional.
